name: RunForPower
description:
This game was created during the The n00bs Game-Jam.

2-4 players are running in a level trying to gather the most ressources to become the one that has the power to rule the land.

There are three different ressources to gather. Each has its own difficulty to get as its value.

Keep your foes away from your ressources by placing traps (A) or throwing Bolas (X).

The game is played with controllers.
